text: hananim-i gogsiggwa gachug-eul pungseonghage hasa geudeul-eun geugeos-eulo geu bun-ui mogs-eul haldanghamyeo geudeul-ui saeng-gag daelo igeos-eun hananim-eul wihan geos-i yo igeos-eun uliui sindeul-eul wihan mogs ila malhadeola geuleona geudeul-ui sin deul-ui mogs-eun hananimkke ileuji mosha na hananim-ui mogs-eun geudeul-ui usang-e ileundago pandanhaneun geudeul-ege saag ham-i iss-eulila
